title: 2 random loot boxes appeared in my inventory

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I opened 2 random loot boxes that appeared in my inventory and they dropped these. I don't know what this means...
I tried restarting my game, and it didn't do anything.
Help

replies.body:
These blank boxes suggests a possible connection problem that can't retrieve assets or updates to your hextech crafting pane.  Does anything show up if you go to the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Trying going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your client can grab assets.  Let me know if you have any questions on this.
Thank you so much, going into the old client worked. :D
